title: Why the Ukraine conflict isn’t a new Cold War
itunes:title: Why the Ukraine conflict isn’t a new Cold War
itunes:subtitle: International history expert Kristina Spohr discusses the historical parallels of the war in Ukraine
description:
International history expert Professor Kristina Spohr talks to Matt Elton about the historical parallels of the current conflict in Ukraine – and why we shouldn’t see it as a new Cold War.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
